Question
========
  
A one-way ANOVA model is used to test the differences between four group averages. Which regression equation belongs to this model? 
Answerlist
----------
* $\hat{y} = a+bx+b_{1}z_{1}+b_{2}z_{2}+b_{3}z_{3}$
* $\hat{y} = a+b_{1}z_{1}+b_{2}z_{2}+b_{3}z_{3}$
* $\hat{y} = a+b_{1}z_{1}+b_{2}z_{2}+b_{3}z_{3}+b_{4}z_{4}$
* $\hat{y} = a+b_{1}z_{1}+b_{2}z_{2}+b_{3}w_{3}+b_{4}w_{4}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
